catalog_info.title: Editing Pore Caitif: Seminar
catalog_info.description: Houghton Library MS Eng 701 is a fifteenth-century copy of a major religious compilation, Pore Caitif, written to teach its lay readers "the right way to heaven without multiplication of many books."  Working together and acquiring the necessary skills along the way, we will prepare and submit for publication a scholarly edition of this work.  We will also consider its wider place in the intellectual and spiritual culture of its period, primarily by way of a study of other manuscripts in which it is found.
